Title: Explanatory chart for physical exercises in children's broadcasts (7-8 years) (fifth set)
Designer: Sports Commission of the PRC (中华人民共和国体育运动委员会)
Publisher: Renmin tiyu chubanshe (人民体育出版社) Beijing
Notes: The slogan on top is a Mao quotation, "Study well, to become better every day" (好好学习天天向上).The poster shows the exercises to be done during the daily morning broadcasts in educational facilities.
